column1: Uchi////For dessert we had the Fried Milk- Vanilla custard
column3: and Toasted Blondie. I use to not care for it
column4: but my love for it grew
column5: lol. It is a must for anyone that visits Uchi. Chef also gifted us with their special dessert as a birthday gift: Apple Okashi- Roased Oats
column7: and Brown Butter. It was different and good
column8: but Fried Milk trumps it all.
